title: Marrying a Pharmacist: Duke, I May Poison You - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance
tags: Ancient Times   Doctors   Female Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Nobles   Poisons   Transmigration   Ugly Protagonist
author: 清魂
description: She happened to travel to another dynasty and became a ugly ordinary person. She married a noble man and was cut off from the outer world from then on. She was alone, struggling to win her dignity. Her husband was the noblest prince of the Dali Kingdom and invincible. They were originally from two different worlds, but thanks to her talents in medicine and toxins as well as her wisdom, she captured his heart step by step...>
